name: Backgammon Pasha: Free online dice and table game!
name_original: Backgammon Pasha: Free online dice and table game!
description:
Pasha Backgammon is a professional online app allowing you to play backgammon online with players around the world and your friends.

You may join the backgammon rooms in different boards or open special table by betting coins amounts. You can check all of the completed matches and all the strategies. You can also check all information on checkers, boards, table and dices. This free and live backgammon game will help you to improve your strategy skills and have tons of fun.

Fast Matching:
Play online now with your friends and players around the world for FREE

Fair play:
Game metric is 100% guaranteed that the dices will always be rolled totally randomly

VIP Lords:
Pasha Backgammon allows to bet and win a lot of coins and chips and talk with friends during the game, only for VIP Lords. VIP Lords can join all the rooms and tournaments without any restrictions. VIP Lords can also join the special King tournaments to win extra bonus points.

Decoration:
Tons of cool boards, tables, dices and lucky charm in the shop. Play, bet and win it big!

Pasha Backgammon will continue to support gamers who love to play online table games, with live tournaments.
Follow us here for our latest news about Backgammon Pasha app
